comments.body: @feiskyer This will get adapter statistics for all the adapters on the host. Should we filter this statistics to just external interface?
Do you mean this also includes container's interface? Let me have a check

@feiskyer no it doesn't include container interfaces. it has data for all NAT networks and etc... just wanted to let u know that it will display every host interface statistics...

PS C:\WINDOWS\system32> Get-NetAdapterStatistics

Name                             ReceivedBytes ReceivedUnicastPackets       SentBytes SentUnicastPackets
----                             ------------- ----------------------       --------- ------------------
Ethernet                           43460935519               44475993     19435836697           34116905
vEthernet (nat)                   0                      0         1818282                  0
vEthernet (External)               37246730539               39003057     12909450968           23184135
Yep, I think this is expected behavior.
Curious: is this a stable interface?
